title: Game of Apocalypse - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural
tags: Character Growth   Game Elements   Magic   Male Protagonist   Special Abilities   Transported into a Game World   Weak to Strong
author: 羽民
description: The Great World of Magic Reformation was a world abandoned by the players. Odin was a player inadvertently left in this world. Followed by the reactivation of the game system, he unearthed the secrets of this abandoned world. The energy of the game was fragmented by the seven gods and the last remaining system fell on Odin. Will he wait for his demise or counterattack? Odin had a saying in it.>
